task.title: Smoothie Queen
task.shortdesc: This recipe is for a smoothie, which is a creamy beverage made of fruit blended with juice, milk, or yogurt.

taskbody.prereq:
Smashing Smoothie
You will need the following ingredients:
1 very ripe banana—frozen is great
1 cup of frozen berries, such as strawberries, raspberries, or blackberries
½ cup or one 6-ounce container of plain, vanilla, or lemon low-fat, vegan yogurt
½ cup of orange juice, juice blend, or chilled green tea
2 ounces of soft tofu(optional—for vegan smoothie drinkers)
1 to 2 tablespoons of honey or to taste
taskbody.context: This recipe is adapted from the Food Network cookbook How to Boil Water: Life Beyond Takeout.

step.cmd: Put everything in a blender and puree until smooth
Pour into 2 tall glasses and serve
